reviewText: I thought there was going to be more to it, but was disappointed. Just three normal people just talking about the Bible. No theology or in depth study to it with examples.

I teach a college/career Sunday School Class and purchased this DVD because it looked like a great tool for my class.  What a waste of money.  Just three people, sitting at a table discussing the Bible.  There's no discussion material and it's incredibly boring to watch.  Definitely not a tool for a Bible Study Class.  Vey disappointed.
